amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of the text of those amendments contained in House Report 106-621 which are printed on pages H3279-H3284 in the Congressional Record for May 17, 2000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 106-621 and offered en bloc: Nos. 5 (as modified), 6-9, 11 (as modified), 12, 14-19, 21-26 and 28-35.

action.text: Spence amendment (A007) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Spence amendments (A007) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
